content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to search for hiking trails near me, which returned a list of results from AllTrails and Yelp. I was then asked to browse the AllTrails website, which provided information and reviews on hiking trails near my location, including the Cross Bay and West Pond Loop Trail and the Ridgewood Reservoir. The reviews mentioned issues with mosquitoes and construction on some of the trails. Links to the AllTrails website were provided.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl wttr.in"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command execute_shell returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import googlemaps\\nfrom datetime import datetime\\n\\n# Enter your API key here\\ngmaps = googlemaps.Client(key=\'YOUR_API_KEY\')\\n\\n# Define the addresses\\norigin = \'YOUR_ADDRESS\'\\ndestination = \'DESTINATION_ADDRESS\'\\n\\n# Define the departure time\\nnow = datetime.now()\\n\\n# Calculate the distance and travel time\\nresult = gmaps.directions(origin, destination, mode=\\"driving\\", departure_time=now)\\ndistance = result[0][\'legs\'][0][\'distance\'][\'text\']\\ntravel_time = result[0][\'legs\'][0][\'duration\'][\'text\']\\n\\nprint(\\"The distance to the hiking trail is:\\", distance)\\nprint(\\"The travel time to the hiking trail is:\\", travel_time)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_python_code returned: Error: execute_python_code() missing 1 required positional argument: 'name'", type='action_result')]
"""
